newsitem.title: BAHRAIN: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi Arabia - Aug 22.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi Arabia - Aug 22.

text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the Saudi Arabian press on Thursday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Education ministry builds seven educational projects worth 56 million riyals.
- Riyad Bank shares lead trading in the Saudi stock market.
- Saudi exports to South Korea rose to $5.43 billion in 1995 from $3.82 billion in 1994. Saudi imported goods from South Korea worth $1.1 billion in 1995, up from $878 million in 1994.
- Saudi Cement Company receives ISO certificate for quality.
- Saudi banks suspend ATM cards for excessive users.
